section.name: Decommision
section.p:
The reconfiguration of a service covers the following methods
Suspendable.suspend()
Reconfigurable.reconfigure(Configuration)
Suspendable.resume()

subsection.name: Suspendable.suspend()
subsection.p: Suspend the service since it is guarenteed that no client will invoke the service.

subsection.name: Reconfigurable.reconfigure(Configuration)
subsection.p: Reconfigure the service with the Configuration instance.

subsection.name: Suspendable.resume()
subsection.p: Resume the service - afterwards clients will invoke the service again.
